
import java.util.*;

public class StudentAL {
String name,usn,age;
StudentAL(String name,String usn,String age){
this.name=name;
this.age=age;
this.usn=usn;
}

public void display(List<StudentAL> list) {
Iterator<StudentAL> itr=list.iterator();
while(itr.hasNext()) {
StudentAL ar=itr.next();
System.out.println("Name:"+ar.name+"\tAge:"+ar.age+"\tUsn:"+ar.usn);
}
}

public static void main(String[] args) {
// TODO Auto-generated method stub
Scanner s = new Scanner(System.in);
List<StudentAL> list = new ArrayList<StudentAL>();
StudentAL obj = new StudentAL("Altamish","MC010","21");
while(true) {
Scanner ss = new Scanner(System.in);
System.out.println("Enter your choice \n1.Add student details "
+ "\n2.Update details "
+ "\n3.Remove element "
+ "\n4.Size of the list "
+ "\n5.Display the list "
+ "\n6.Clear elements "
+ "\n7.Search by name and display if data is there or not");
int ch=s.nextInt();
switch(ch) {
case 1:
System.out.println("Enter the no of student details you want to add");
int n=ss.nextInt();
for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
System.out.println("Enter your Name : ");
String name=ss.next();
System.out.println("Enter your USN : ");
String usn=ss.next();
System.out.println("Enter your Age : ");
String age=ss.next();
StudentAL obj1= new StudentAL(name,usn,age);
list.add(obj1);
}
break;
case 2:
System.out.println("Enter the index you want to update");
int i=s.nextInt();
System.out.println("Enter your Name : ");
String name=s.next();
System.out.println("Enter your USN : ");
String usn=s.next();
System.out.println("Enter your Age : ");
String age=s.next();
StudentAL a1= new StudentAL(name,usn,age);
list.set(i, a1);
break;
case 3:
System.out.println("Enter the index you want to delete");
int a=s.nextInt();
list.remove(a);
break;
case 4:
System.out.println("Size of the list is : "+list.size());
break;
case 5:
obj.display(list);
break;
case 6:
list.clear();
System.out.println("List is cleared. Enter 5 to check the display(Empty list will be shown)");
break;
case 7:
System.out.print("Search array by Name : ");
String search = s.next();
Iterator<StudentAL> itr = list.iterator();
while(itr.hasNext()) {
StudentAL ll = itr.next();
if(ll.name.equalsIgnoreCase(search)) {
System.out.print("Data found");
break;
}
else {
System.out.print("Data not found");
break;
}
}
break;
default:
System.out.println("End of line");
break;
}
System.out.println("\nDo you want to continue? \n1.Yes \n2.No");
ch = ss.nextInt();
if(ch==1) {

}
else if(ch==2) {
break;
}
else {
System.out.println("Invalid input");
}
}
}
}
